summary:
////\\\\\***Next Version Is out Try it if you dare jk u don't need to dare :D

Tired of having to go find a vampire so you can be one dont worry
now you can start as a Vampire!*Update tired of having to start the Companions guild to be a werewolf start as one. Start As a Ghost.*ADDS one more Ghost Race
descriptionHtml:
INSTALL:
1 - Manually download

2 - Extract the file to a place of easy location. (Like Desktop or Documents)

3 - Drag all playable races files into C:ProgramFiles(x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim /data

Or Wherever you installed your skyrim


4 - ---> launcher Skyrim ----> "Data files", and activate: More Races



Halo for angel race is by volvaga0 100% textures and modeling credit to him I take no credit for halo modeling
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11005

Demon Wings By galy3
WIngs for Demon race is by galy3 100% textures and modeling credit to them I take no credit for wing modeling
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11621


############################################################
1.09 due to me not updating in a while#############################
•Added angel with custom sounds :) and a working mannaquien that doesn\'t crash game and fixd 3rd person issues
•added Angel with custom sounds and a mannaquien and fixed shapeshifter 3rd person issues and i know it has 1st person issues on monster i will try and fix them :)

#######################################################
##################################################################
Version 1.7
•Fixed Dremora not having hands, Gives Demon Hair and facial hair, Spiced Up some of the Shapeshifters races adding spells next version will include more races and spells :)
#################################################################

Version 1.6-1.5
•****ADDS Dark Seducer and Golden Sant fixes most or all of what i can tell of crashes got rid of Children race going to add more quality one :p

################Version 1.05#####################################
*Fixes Annoying Demon Drowning
*Fixes Character Creation Crashes
*Fixes Werewolf so no conflicting problems with companion Quest
*Adds children race, afflicted race, and shapeshifting Race
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*****************************Race List

Adds a darker shaded ghost of every normal playable races
Adds demon
Adds Dremora with ghost
Adds Every listed character except demon as werewolf and vampire
Adds children Race basically smaller version of normal races
Adds Dweller
Adds Afflicted
Adds Dwemmer
Adds Shape Shifter
Adds Elder Race
This Mod Will Continually Be Updated And There Is More To The List Just The smaller
Version of It :D

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*******VERSION 1.04 IS OUT REUPDATE FIXED ANNOYING FLAME BUG SO YEAHAHA

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
////\\\\\***Next Version Is out Try it if you dare jk u don't need to dare :D

Tired of having to go find a vampire so you can be one dont worry
now you can start as a Vampire!*Update tired of having to start the Companions guild to be a werewolf start as one. Start As a Ghost.*ADDS one more Ghost Race Fixed arm issues!
*now added 2 more race :P/// Demon is currently Beta will add more to it\\\
*Change log

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.02
•Fixed problem with Ghost not appearing in third person and you can actually see the character instead of it being a blank see through character
•Added a playable dwemmer,dweller Each with certain spell only magic! :P
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

VIDEO* http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_ecSc5ek-8&feature=channel_video_title
WILL HAVE UPDATED VIDEO UP SOON!

Steam Workshop Download TO
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10667

\\\\\\*******Sorry i haven't updated the mod in a while i just had leg surgery making it very difficult to prop my leg up and use the construction kit the mod will not be discountinued but i will need a week or two before anymore work cuse I don't want to release any failed patches like before alright thanks for support and have a great week :D******////

******The wing was from: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11621&navtag=file/images.php?id=11621&tab=3
Model was By Galy3 the wing model is 100% his i take no credit for the textures or model of them
These Will Later Be Added

The Demon WIngs were modeled and textured by favoredsoul and i take no credit in term for modeling or texturing them i just applied them to the race skin. Due to them Closing There Account I Cannot Credit Them with their link :(
author: IAMSIAO
